data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OrderChangeRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票请求","children":[{"name":"Header","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ServiceName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"服务名称,取值范围：ISSUEEMDS、 ISSUEBAGG、ISSUESEAT、 ISSUEUMNR","children":[]},{"name":"AirLine","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Party","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"发送人相关方信息。","children":[{"name":"Participant","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"消息参与人信息","children":[{"name":"MarketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方","children":[{"name":"AirlineDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Sender","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"消息发送人信息。","children":[{"name":"TravelAgency","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提供旅行服务的私人零售商或公共服务以及代表供应商向公众提供的与旅游相关的服务，例如活动，航空公司，旅行保险和旅行团。","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]},{"name":"AgencyID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Eterm账号","children":[]},{"name":"IATA_Number","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Iata号","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Request","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"BookingRef","type":"array","quantity":"0..2","default":"","description":"关联的预定项","children":[{"name":"BookingID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号或者XXXXXX（EMDS无PNR时填XXXXXX）","children":[]},{"name":"TypeCode","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"DataLists","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数据列表","children":[{"name":"PaxList","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息列表","children":[{"name":"Pax","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息（出EMDS无PNR时必须有此节点）","children":[{"name":"PaxID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客标记","children":[]},{"name":"PTC","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型：ADT、CHD、INF","children":[]},{"name":"Individual","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客个人信息","children":[{"name":"GivenName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓","children":[]},{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客名","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"ServiceDefinitionList","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"服务信息列表","children":[{"name":"ServiceDefinition","type":"array","quantity":"0..4","default":"","description":"服务信息","children":[{"name":"OwnerCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"服务提供方(航司二字码)","children":[]},{"name":"Detail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"详细信息","children":[{"name":"@RFIC","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"产品因子码","children":[]},{"name":"@RFISC","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"因子码子码","children":[]},{"name":"@SeatNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位号（座位出票必填）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Amount","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"价格","children":[{"name":"@CurCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"币种","children":[]}]},{"name":"Description","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"产品描述","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelerType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型,ADT、CHD、INF,Emds出票必须","children":[]},{"name":"@TravelerRPH","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客标记(表示第几名旅客),有PNR时必填","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightSegmentRPH","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段标记(表示第几段，EMDA必填),有PNR时必填","children":[]},{"name":"@At","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发城市，EK团队押金产品需填","children":[]},{"name":"@ETNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ET号，根据航司产品的要求选填","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TaxList","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"EMDA无税项","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..4","default":"","description":"税项（不超过4个","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"币种","children":[]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类型（长度两位、大写、数字与字母组合、字母开头）","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Endorsement","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"签转信息","children":[]},{"name":"Remark","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"备注信息","children":[]},{"name":"Commission","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"代理费信息","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代理费,701固定表示为代理费","children":[]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按百分比,表示代理费按百分比方式收取","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按金额,按百分比和按金额只能选取一种","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"币种,按金额方式时必填","children":[]}]},{"name":"PaymentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付节点","children":[{"name":"Amount","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[{"name":"@CurCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"币种","children":[]}]},{"name":"TypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付方式：CA、BOP .CC（其中cc信用卡暂未启用）","children":[]},{"name":"Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"微航付费座位FP项自由文本信息,仅用于微航付费座位,AMAINV*WC*yymmddQnnnn*0","children":[]},{"name":"PaymentCard","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信用卡节点,信用卡支付该节点必传","children":[{"name":"@CardCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"固定值 TP","children":[]},{"name":"@CardNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡号","children":[]},{"name":"@ExpireDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到期时间","children":[]},{"name":"@ApprovalType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"固定值 S","children":[]}]},{"name":"Bop","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"加密后的德付通支付密码","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema:
[
    {
        "name": "OrderChangeRS",
        "type": "object",
        "quantity": "1",
        "description": "出票响应",
        "children": [
            {
                "name": "Response",
                "type": "object",
                "quantity": "1",
                "description": "出票响应信息",
                "children": [
                    {
                        "name": "Success",
                        "type": "string",
                        "quantity": "1",
                        "description": "结果",
                        "children": [],
                        "default": ""
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "EMD",
                        "type": "string",
                        "quantity": "1",
                        "description": "EMD票号",
                        "children": [],
                        "default": ""
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "Warn",
                        "type": "string",
                        "quantity": "0..n",
                        "description": "警告信息",
                        "children": [],
                        "default": ""
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "OrderID",
                        "type": "object",
                        "quantity": "1",
                        "description": "IBE+订单号集合",
                        "children": [
                            {
                                "name": "EMDOrderID",
                                "type": "string",
                                "quantity": "1",
                                "description": "EMD订单号",
                                "children": [],
                                "default": ""
                            }
                        ],
                        "default": ""
                    }
                ],
                "default": ""
            },
            {
                "name": "Errors",
                "type": "object",
                "quantity": "1",
                "default": "",
                "description": "请求处理失败",
                "children": [
                    {
                        "name": "Error",
                        "type": "array",
                        "quantity": "0..n",
                        "default": "",
                        "description": "请求处理失败",
                        "children": [
                            {
                                "name": "@Code",
                                "type": "string",
                                "quantity": "1",
                                "default": "",
                                "description": "错误码",
                                "children": []
                            },
                            {
                                "name": "@ShortText",
                                "type": "string",
                                "quantity": "1",
                                "default": "",
                                "description": "错误信息",
                                "children": []
                            },
                            {
                                "name": "Trace",
                                "type": "array",
                                "quantity": "0..1",
                                "default": "",
                                "description": "底层错误信息",
                                "children": [
                                    {
                                        "name": "IATA_EMD_ErrorRs",
                                        "type": "array",
                                        "quantity": "0..1",
                                        "default": "",
                                        "description": "底层错误信息",
                                        "children": [
                                            {
                                                "name": "ErrorCode",
                                                "type": "string",
                                                "quantity": "0..1",
                                                "default": "",
                                                "description": "底层错误码",
                                                "children": []
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "name": "ErrorDesCn",
                                                "type": "string",
                                                "quantity": "0..1",
                                                "default": "",
                                                "description": "底层错误中文错误描述",
                                                "children": []
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "name": "ErrorDesEn",
                                                "type": "string",
                                                "quantity": "0..1",
                                                "default": "",
                                                "description": "底层错误英文错误描述",
                                                "children": []
                                            }
                                        ]
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }        
        ],
        "default": ""
    }
]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OrderChangeRQ>
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>ISSUEEMDS</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>EY</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <Party>
        <Participant>
            <MarketingCarrier>
                <AirlineDesigCode>EY</AirlineDesigCode>
            </MarketingCarrier>
        </Participant>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <AgencyID>fd0173</AgencyID>
                <PseudoCityID>BJS247</PseudoCityID>
                <IATA_Number>08300014</IATA_Number>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <Request>
        <BookingRef>
            <BookingID>XXXXXX</BookingID>
            <TypeCode>PNR</TypeCode>
        </BookingRef>
        <DataLists>
            <PaxList>
                <Pax>
                    <PaxID>1</PaxID>
                    <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                    <Individual>
                        <GivenName>ZHANG</GivenName>
                        <Surname>JIANXIN</Surname>
                    </Individual>
                </Pax>
            </PaxList>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition TravelerRPH="1">
                    <OwnerCode>EY</OwnerCode>
                    <Detail RFIC="C" RFISC="0C1" />
                    <Amount CurCode="CNY">2378</Amount>
                    <Description>UPTO33LB 15KG BAGGAGE</Description>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
            <TaxList>
                <Tax Amount="70" CurCode="CNY" Code="AB" />
            </TaxList>
        </DataLists>
        <Endorsement>XXXASDASD</Endorsement>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">2378</Amount>
            <TypeCode>CA</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</OrderChangeRQ>

<OrderChangeRQ>
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>ISSUEEMDS</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>EY</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <Party>
        <Participant>
            <MarketingCarrier>
                <AirlineDesigCode>EY</AirlineDesigCode>
            </MarketingCarrier>
        </Participant>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <AgencyID>fd0173</AgencyID>
                <PseudoCityID>BJS247</PseudoCityID>
                <IATA_Number>08300014</IATA_Number>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <Request>
        <BookingRef>
            <BookingID>KQTJGV</BookingID>
            <TypeCode>PNR</TypeCode>
        </BookingRef>
        <DataLists>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition TravelerRPH="1" FlightSegmentRPH="2">
                    <OwnerCode>EY</OwnerCode>
                    <Detail RFIC="D" RFISC="98F" />
                    <Amount CurCode="CNY">2378</Amount>
                    <Description>Penalty Fee</Description>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
            <TaxList>
                <Tax Amount="70" CurCode="CNY" Code="AB" />
            </TaxList>
        </DataLists>
        <Endorsement>XXXASDASD</Endorsement>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">2448</Amount>
            <TypeCode>CA</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</OrderChangeRQ>

<OrderChangeRQ>
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>ISSUESEAT</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>MH</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <Party>
        <Participant>
            <MarketingCarrier>
                <AirlineDesigCode>MH</AirlineDesigCode>
            </MarketingCarrier>
        </Participant>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <AgencyID>fd0173</AgencyID>
                <PseudoCityID>BJS247</PseudoCityID>
                <IATA_Number>08300014</IATA_Number>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <Request>
        <BookingRef>
            <BookingID>HS6E7Z</BookingID>
            <TypeCode>PNR</TypeCode>
        </BookingRef>
        <DataLists>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition FlightSegmentRPH="2"
                                   TravelerRPH="1">
                    <OwnerCode>EY</OwnerCode>
                    <Detail RFIC="A" RFISC="0B5" SeatNumber="15C"/>
                    <Amount CurCode="CNY">93</Amount>
                    <Description>PRE RESERVED SEAT ASSIGNMENT</Description>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
        </DataLists>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">93</Amount>
            <TypeCode>MH</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</OrderChangeRQ>

<OrderChangeRQ>
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>ISSUEBAGG</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>PS</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <Party>
        <Participant>
            <MarketingCarrier>
                <AirlineDesigCode>PS</AirlineDesigCode>
            </MarketingCarrier>
        </Participant>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <AgencyID>fd0173</AgencyID>
                <PseudoCityID>BJS247</PseudoCityID>
                <IATA_Number>08300014</IATA_Number>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <Request>
        <BookingRef>
            <BookingID>KQTJDR</BookingID>
            <TypeCode>PNR</TypeCode>
        </BookingRef>
        <DataLists>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition FlightSegmentRPH="2"
                                   TravelerRPH="1">
                    <OwnerCode>PS</OwnerCode>
                    <Detail RFIC="C" RFISC="0CC" />
                    <Amount CurCode="CNY">227</Amount>
                    <Description>CHECKED BAG</Description>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
        </DataLists>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">227</Amount>
            <TypeCode>CA</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</OrderChangeRQ>

<OrderChangeRQ>
    <Header>
        <ServiceName>ISSUEUMNR</ServiceName>
        <AirLine>PS</AirLine>
    </Header>
    <Party>
        <Participant>
            <MarketingCarrier>
                <AirlineDesigCode>PS</AirlineDesigCode>
            </MarketingCarrier>
        </Participant>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <AgencyID>fd0173</AgencyID>
                <PseudoCityID>BJS247</PseudoCityID>
                <IATA_Number>08300014</IATA_Number>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <Request>
        <BookingRef>
            <BookingID>KQTJFB</BookingID>
            <TypeCode>PNR</TypeCode>
        </BookingRef>
        <DataLists>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition TravelerRPH="1" FlightSegmentRPH="2">
                    <OwnerCode>AY</OwnerCode>
                    <Detail RFIC="E" RFISC="0BH"/>
                    <Amount CurCode="CNY">556</Amount>
                    <Description>UNACCOMPANIED MINOR</Description>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
        </DataLists>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">556</Amount>
            <TypeCode>CA</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</OrderChangeRQ>
